channel.title: Notes on Jeff Smith
channel.link:
http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/Recent content in Notes on Jeff SmithHugo -- gohugo.ioen-usSun, 02 Sep 2018 00:00:00 +0000
Block all IP only requests on nginxhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/nginx-block-all-ip-addresses/Sun, 02 Sep 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/nginx-block-all-ip-addresses/server { listen 80; # server_name 8.8.8.8;# catch ip address server_name "~^[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}$"; # catch ip address deny all; } From https://www.reddit.com/r/nginx/comments/3m1qbd/allow_all_domain_names_but_not_ip/
Remove IP blocked by DenyHostshttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/remove-ip-blocked-by-denyhosts/Fri, 03 Aug 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/remove-ip-blocked-by-denyhosts/Wow, this is annoying…. sudo service denyhosts stop # or whatever sudo vim /etc/hosts.deny sudo vim /var/lib/denyhosts/hosts sudo vim /var/lib/denyhosts/hosts-restricted sudo vim /var/lib/denyhosts/hosts-root sudo vim /var/lib/denyhosts/hosts-valid sudo vim /var/lib/denyhosts/users-hosts sudo vim /var/lib/denyhosts/allowed-hosts # optionally add here sudo service denyhosts start From https://inrg.soe.ucsc.edu/howto-unblock-an-ip-thats-been-blocked-by-denyhosts/
Change the from line in the Alpine email clienthttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/change-from-line-in-alpine-email-client/Wed, 01 Aug 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/change-from-line-in-alpine-email-client/From Alpine’s [M]AIN MENU, choose [S]etup, then [C]onfig. Move down to the Customized Headers option. Press “A Add Value”. Use the format: From: "Jeff Smith" <jeff@jeffsmithdomain.com> From: https://www.washington.edu/alpine/faq/config.html
List all kde qbus shortcutshttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/list-all-kde-qbus-shortcuts/Fri, 06 Jul 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/list-all-kde-qbus-shortcuts/List all: qdbus org.kde.kglobalaccel /component/kwin org.kde.kglobalaccel.Component.shortcutNames Execute: qdbus org.kde.kglobalaccel /component/kwin org.kde.kglobalaccel.Component.invokeShortcut shortcutName
ERROR: One or more PGP signatures could not be verified when using AURhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/error-one-or-more-pgp-signatures-could-not-be-verified-when-using-aur/Fri, 22 Jun 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/error-one-or-more-pgp-signatures-could-not-be-verified-when-using-aur/Assuming you trust the dev… gpg --recv-keys <key-id>
Kernel panic - not syncing: no working init foundhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/kernel-panic-not-syncing-no-working-init-found/Fri, 22 Jun 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/kernel-panic-not-syncing-no-working-init-found/Basic steps… mount /dev/sda2 /mnt mount /dev/sda1 /mnt/boot arch-chroot /mnt # or manjaro-chroot mkinitcpio -p linux grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg exit umount -R /mnt reboot From: https://bbs.archlinux.org/viewtopic.php?id=192296
KDE kwin with nvidia drivers crashes on switching desktopshttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/kde-kwin-with-nvidia-drivers-crashes-on-switching-desktops/Sun, 10 Jun 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/kde-kwin-with-nvidia-drivers-crashes-on-switching-desktops/Try disabling Desktop Switch On-Screen Display in KDE settings (Desktop Behavior > Virtual Desktops > Switching)
Install EDUP EP-DB1607 on Archhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/install-edup-ep-db1607-on-arch/Sat, 02 Jun 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/install-edup-ep-db1607-on-arch/To install drivers for: EDUP EP-DB1607 Wireless Usb Adapter ac600 grab drivers from AUR: packer rtl8821au-dkms-git
The data connection could not be established: EHOSTUNREACH - No route to hosthttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/the-data-connection-could-not-be-established-ehostunreach-no-route-to-host/Fri, 01 Jun 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/the-data-connection-could-not-be-established-ehostunreach-no-route-to-host/Specify passive port range in ftp config and open the same range in firewall. From: https://serverfault.com/questions/566593/vsftpd-the-data-connection-could-not-be-established-ehostunreach-no-route-t
Check and install updates via terminal on OSXhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/check-and-install-updates-via-terminal-on-osx/Sun, 22 Apr 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/check-and-install-updates-via-terminal-on-osx/List: softwareupdate -l Install: sudo softwareupdate -ia From: http://osxdaily.com/2011/01/13/install-mac-os-x-software-updates
Find and replace file text recursivelyhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/find-and-replace-file-text-recursively/Sun, 01 Apr 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/find-and-replace-file-text-recursively/find . -type f -name "*food*" -exec sed -i 's/taco/pizza/g' {} +
Simple ssh login email notificationhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/simple-ssh-login-email-notification/Wed, 21 Mar 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/simple-ssh-login-email-notification/echo -n 'ALERT - Shell Login (a-server) on:' `date` `who` | mail -s "Alert: Shell Login from `who | cut -d"(" -f2 | cut -d")" -f1`" admin@google.com
Setup certbot to install nginx ssl on Ubuntu 16.04http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/setup-certbot-to-install-nginx-ssl-on-ubuntu-16.04/Thu, 15 Mar 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/setup-certbot-to-install-nginx-ssl-on-ubuntu-16.04/Update firewall. Run… sudo add-apt-repository ppa:certbot/certbot sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install python-certbot-nginx sudo certbot --nginx -d example.com -d www.example.com sudo certbot renew --dry-run From: https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-secure-nginx-with-let-s-encrypt-on-ubuntu-16-04
wmctrlhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/wmctrl/Sat, 03 Mar 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/wmctrl/wmctrl -l list windows wmctrl -d list desktops wmctrl -c <win> close window wmctrl -r <win> -t <desk> move window to desktop
Really really quick postgres install on ubuntu 16.04http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/really-quick-postgres-install-on-ubuntu/Fri, 02 Mar 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/really-quick-postgres-install-on-ubuntu/sudo apt-get install postgresql postgresql-contrib sudo -u postgres psql ALTER USER postgres PASSWORD '123456'; \q
Install KDE Image Menu (Kim) on Linuxhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/install-kde-image-menu-kim-on-linux/Sat, 24 Feb 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/install-kde-image-menu-kim-on-linux/Do the following… cd ~ && wget http://bouveyron.free.fr/kim/release/kim4-0.9.5.tar.gz && tar zxvf kim4-0.9.5.tar.gz Run: sudo cp ~/kim4/src/kim_*.desktop /usr/share/kservices5/ServiceMenus/ sudo cp ~/kim4/src/bin/kim_* /usr/bin/ mkdir /usr/share/kim cp ~/kim4/COPYING /usr/share/kim/kim_about.txt mkdir /usr/share/kim/slideshow/ cp ~/kim4/src/slideshow/* /usr/share/kim/slideshow/ mkdir /usr/share/kim/gallery cp ~/kim4/src/gallery/* /usr/share/kim/gallery From: http://www.ubuntubuzz.com/2016/05/how-to-install-kim-kde-image-menu-in.html
Update mirrors on manjaro linuxhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/update-mirrors-on-manjaro-linux/Wed, 21 Feb 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/update-mirrors-on-manjaro-linux/sudo pacman-mirrors --fasttrack && sudo pacman -Syyu
Simple nginx path redirecthttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/simple-nginx-path-redirect/Fri, 02 Feb 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/simple-nginx-path-redirect/Add a similar entry to the server block… rewrite ^/knowledge/(.*)$ /content/knowledge/$1 permanent; rewrite ^/knowledge /content/knowledge permanent;
Sparkjava or tomcat slow to start on cloud VMhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/sparkjava-or-tomcat-slow-to-start-on-cloud-vm/Wed, 24 Jan 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/sparkjava-or-tomcat-slow-to-start-on-cloud-vm/There might not be enough entropy from /dev/random causing blocking. Use a software solution like Haveged. Install haveged on ubuntu: sudo apt-get install haveged Check entropy on linux with: cat /proc/sys/kernel/random/entropy_avail
nmaphttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/nmap/Sat, 13 Jan 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/nmap/## Commands nmap 192.168.10.1 scan a host nmap 192.168.10.1/24 scan a subnet nmap 192.168.10.1-50 scan a range nmap 192.168.10.1 -sV daemon version detection nmap 192.168.10.1 -O --osscan-guess OS detection
Create local iso repository on XenServerhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/create-local-iso-repository-on-xenserver/Tue, 09 Jan 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/create-local-iso-repository-on-xenserver/From the server console: mkdir -p /var/opt/xen/iso_import xe sr-create name-label="MyISORepository" type=iso device-config:location=/var/opt/xen/iso_import/ device-config:legacy_mode=true content-type=iso wget <something> -P /var/opt/xen/iso_import From: https://discussions.citrix.com/topic/250684-import-iso-image-to-xenserver/
iftophttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/iftop/Tue, 02 Jan 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/iftop/## Commands sudo iftop use default interface sudo iftop -i wlp2s0 use specified interface sudo iftop -n disable hostname lookup sudo iftop -P show ports sudo iftop -p promiscuous mode
Rename a S3 buckethttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/rename-a-s3-bucket/Sat, 30 Dec 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/rename-a-s3-bucket/You cant. Create a new one and copy the contents… aws s3 mb s3://new.jeffsmithdev.com aws s3 sync s3://old.jeffsmithdev.com s3://new.jeffsmithdev.com aws s3 rb --force s3://old.jeffsmithdev.com
Install imapsync under WSLhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/install-imapsync-under-wsl/Sat, 09 Dec 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/install-imapsync-under-wsl/Using Ubu 16.04… sudo apt-get install libssl-dev makepasswd rcs perl-doc libio-tee-perl git libmail-imapclient-perl libdigest-md5-file-perl libterm-readkey-perl libfile-copy-recursive-perl build-essential make automake libunicode-string-perl libauthen-ntlm-perl libcrypt-ssleay-perl libdigest-hmac-perl libfile-copy-recursive-perl libio-compress-perl libio-socket-inet6-perl libio-socket-ssl-perl libio-tee-perl libmodule-scandeps-perl libnet-ssleay-perl libpar-packer-perl libreadonly-perl libterm-readkey-perl libtest-pod-perl libtest-simple-perl libunicode-string-perl liburi-perl libdata-uniqid-perl libtest-mockobject-perl cpanminus sudo cpanm JSON::WebToken Test::MockObject Unicode::String Data::Uniqid Crypt::OpenSSL::RSA Dist::CheckConflicts JSON::WebToken::Crypt::RSA Sys::MemInfo git clone git://github.com/imapsync/imapsync.git cd imapsync mkdir dist sudo make install From http://zero-configuration.com/2016/12/31/install-use-imapsync-ubuntu-16-04/ with a few packages added by me
Get CPU information via terminal on Linuxhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/get-cpu-information-via-terminal-on-linux/Sun, 19 Nov 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/get-cpu-information-via-terminal-on-linux/full info: cat /proc/cpuinfo or search info via: cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep 'model name' | uniq
Enable git debugging on linux and windowshttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/enable-git-debugging-on-linux-and-windows/Wed, 15 Nov 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/enable-git-debugging-on-linux-and-windows/linux: export GIT_TRACE_PACKET=1 export GIT_TRACE=1 export GIT_CURL_VERBOSE=1 windows: set GIT_TRACE_PACKET=1 set GIT_TRACE=1 set GIT_CURL_VERBOSE=1
Up arrow to autocomplete from history in bashhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/up-arrow-to-autocomplete-in-bash/Thu, 09 Nov 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/up-arrow-to-autocomplete-in-bash/Edit .inputrc and add: ## arrow up "\e[A":history-search-backward ## arrow down "\e[B":history-search-forward From: https://askubuntu.com/questions/59846/bash-history-search-partial-up-arrow
fatal: The remote end hung up unexpectedly pushing to githubhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/fatal-the-remote-end-hung-up-unexpectedly-pushing-to-github/Tue, 07 Nov 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/fatal-the-remote-end-hung-up-unexpectedly-pushing-to-github/You need to increase the ssh/http buffers: git config --global http.postBuffer 524288000 git config --global ssh.postBuffer 524288000 From: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15240815/git-fatal-the-remote-end-hung-up-unexpectedly
git and hg clone with full windows path and ssh loginhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/git-and-hg-clone-with-full-windows-path-and-ssh-login/Mon, 06 Nov 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/git-and-hg-clone-with-full-windows-path-and-ssh-login/git uses a single slash before path as in: dev.jeffsmithdev.com:62/C/repos/git/archived/example hg uses a double slash before path as in: dev.jeffsmithdev.com:62//C/repos/hg/archived/example
nmonhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/nmon/Thu, 02 Nov 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/nmon/``` Shortcuts c cpu k kernel n network N NFS m memory d disk v verbose output j file system t top processes ````
Run parallel ssh command with hosts filehttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/run-parallel-ssh-command-with-hosts-file/Mon, 23 Oct 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/run-parallel-ssh-command-with-hosts-file/Parallel ssh to update ubuntu servers… pssh -h $HOME/bin/pssh-hosts -t 180 'sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get -y upgrade'
tophttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/top/Mon, 23 Oct 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/top/## Shortcuts 1 toggle showing all cpu cores s change update interval u show user processes R sort by PID P sort by CPU M sort by RAM c toggle full path k kill a process via PID w save modified
Run duplicati as userhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/run-duplicati-as-user/Sun, 22 Oct 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/run-duplicati-as-user/systemctl –user start duplicati
KDE mouse acceleration too fasthttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/kde-mouse-acceleration-too-fast/Thu, 19 Oct 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/kde-mouse-acceleration-too-fast/KDE setttings doesn’t affect mouse acceleration, so we use xinput. Get the mouse id: xinput list Get all the props for the mouse: xinput list-props 14 Set the acceleration property. Value may need to be adjusted. xinput set-prop 14 669 -1 From: https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/90572/how-can-i-set-mouse-sensitivity-not-just-mouse-acceleration
You need to install XCode 5.0.0http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/you-need-to-install-xcode-5.0.0/Sat, 14 Oct 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/you-need-to-install-xcode-5.0.0/Run… sudo /usr/bin/xcode-select -switch /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer From: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/31554125/attempt-to-install-qt-on-os-x-gives-you-need-to-install-xcode-5-0-0-but-this
Enable ssh server in WSL (i.e. window's bash)http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/enable-ssh-server-in-wsl-i.e.-windows-bash/Wed, 11 Oct 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/enable-ssh-server-in-wsl-i.e.-windows-bash/Besides installing the server via: sudo apt-get install openssh-server you need to edit the sshd config and set UsePrivilegeSeparation no then a full restart: sudo service ssh --full-restart From: https://superuser.com/questions/1111591/how-can-i-ssh-into-bash-on-ubuntu-on-windows-10/1114162#1114162
Edit grub video resolutionhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/edit-grub-video-resolution/Tue, 10 Oct 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/edit-grub-video-resolution/Change grub resolution: sudo subl /etc/default/grub Edit (run videotest from grub via c to see supported) GRUB_GFXMODE=1024x768x32 Rebuild grub with this or equiv sudo grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg In the same file you can change the default text resolution by appending the res to this line GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT="quiet resume=UUID=75a2dd2e-c8d0-4400-a8c8-182ae551cb8d video=1600x900" Rebuild grub
Fix Teamviewer doesn't launch on archhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/fix-teamviewer-doesnt-launch-on-arch/Tue, 10 Oct 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/fix-teamviewer-doesnt-launch-on-arch/Steps… Download https://archive.archlinux.org/packages/l/lib32-freetype2/lib32-freetype2-2.8-2-x86_64.pkg.tar.xz Move to the folder you downloaded the package. sudo pacman -U lib32-freetype2-2.8-2-x86_64.pkg.tar.xz From: https://bbs.archlinux.org/viewtopic.php?id=230675
Change visudo editor from nano to vimhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/change-visudo-editor-from-nano-to-vim/Tue, 19 Sep 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/change-visudo-editor-from-nano-to-vim/sudo update-alternatives –config editor
Jetbrains toolbox opens to blank windowhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/jetbrains-toolbox-opens-to-blank-window/Mon, 18 Sep 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/jetbrains-toolbox-opens-to-blank-window/Launch with arg: --disable-seccomp-filter-sandbox From: https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/359236/jetbrains-toolbox-loads-to-a-blank-screen
Open in Guake python script for Nautilushttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/open-in-guake-python-script-for-nautilus/Wed, 13 Sep 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/open-in-guake-python-script-for-nautilus/#!/usr/bin/env python import os, subprocess """ Summary: This is a Nautilus script to right click on an item and open in Guake. It tries to be as simple as possible. You need to select a file or folder for this to work. Tested: Arch & python 3 Install: cd .local/share/nautilus/scripts/ vi open_in_guake.py chmod +x open_in_guake.py restart nautilus """ cur_dir = os.getcwd() if os.path.isfile(cur_dir): cur_dir = os.path.dirname(cur_dir) subprocess.call([ u'guake', u'--execute-command=%s' % 'bash', u'--new-tab=%s' % cur_dir, u'--show', u'--rename-current-tab=%s' % os.
Change gnome desktop background color via terminalhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/change-gnome-desktop-background-color-via-terminal/Tue, 05 Sep 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/change-gnome-desktop-background-color-via-terminal/gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.background picture-uri “ gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.background primary-color “#666”
Change gnome 3 desktop icon sizehttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/change-gnome-3-desktop-icon-size/Sat, 02 Sep 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/change-gnome-3-desktop-icon-size/Other options didn’t work. gsettings set org.gnome.nautilus.icon-view default-zoom-level 'small'
Disable animation in gnome 3http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/disable-animation-in-gnome-3/Sat, 02 Sep 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/disable-animation-in-gnome-3/Run then log out and in: gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.interface enable-animations false
The QT_QPA_PLATFORMTHEME environment variable is not set correctlyhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/the-qt_qpa_platformtheme-environment-variable-is-not-set-correctly/Fri, 01 Sep 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/the-qt_qpa_platformtheme-environment-variable-is-not-set-correctly/Set environment variable in /etc/environment and add the following line: QT_QPA_PLATFORMTHEME=qt5ct Restart the system From https://github.com/SwagArch/swagarch-build/issues/6
Disable KDE5 baloo file indexer and delete search datahttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/disable-kde5-baloo-file-indexer-and-delete-search-data/Thu, 31 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/disable-kde5-baloo-file-indexer-and-delete-search-data/Check status: balooctl status Disable: balooctl disable Delete data: rm -rf ~/.local/share/baloo
How to set the default java on archhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/how-to-set-the-default-java-on-arch/Wed, 30 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/how-to-set-the-default-java-on-arch/archlinux-java status archlinux-java set java-8-jdk
Regenerate openssh server keys on ubuntuhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/regenerate-openssh-server-keys-on-ubuntu/Wed, 30 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/regenerate-openssh-server-keys-on-ubuntu/Remove old keys: sudo rm -v /etc/ssh/ssh_host_* Generate new keys: sudo dpkg-reconfigure openssh-server
ReInstall Youtrack service on widowshttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/reinstall-youtrack-service-on-widows/Sat, 26 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/reinstall-youtrack-service-on-widows/From youtrack\bin…. youtrack.bat service install --force /runAsSystem
error: 'somepackage': duplicate target installed using packerhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/error-somepackage-duplicate-target-installed-using-packer/Sat, 26 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/error-somepackage-duplicate-target-installed-using-packer/When something fails installing with packer, try yaourt. I dont know why this works.
Sync imap accounts with imapsynchttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/sync-imap-accounts-with-imapsync/Thu, 24 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/sync-imap-accounts-with-imapsync/Arch AUR handles all perl requirements. Install: packer imapsync Run: imapsync \ --host1 imap.gmail.com -port1 993 --ssl1 --user1 fatty@gmail.com --password1 11111111111111 --delete2 \ --host2 outlook.office365.com -port2 993 --ssl2 --user2 fatty@ms.com --password2 22222222222 --delete2
Change remote git originhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/change-remote-git-origin/Sun, 20 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/change-remote-git-origin/git remote set-url origin git://new.url.here from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/16330404/how-to-remove-remote-origin-from-git-repo
Intellij disable change.laf.on.editor.theme.changehttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/intellij-disable-change.laf.on.editor.theme.change/Sun, 20 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/intellij-disable-change.laf.on.editor.theme.change/Disable idea’s automatic look and feel switching when changing color schemes. Open .IntelliJIdea2017.2/config/options/options.xml Edit
Show hidden files in gtk 2 file dialoghttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/show-hidden-files-in-gtk-2-file-dialog/Sun, 20 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/show-hidden-files-in-gtk-2-file-dialog/Edit ~/.config/gtk-2.0/gtkfilechooser.ini Change ShowHidden=false
Convert mercurial repository to githttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/convert-mercurial-repository-to-git/Wed, 16 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/convert-mercurial-repository-to-git/Clone fast-export locally to use clone existing new repos or init setup python mercurial via virtualenv and pip in new repos using env run: ~/fast-export/hg-fast-export.sh -r /home/fatty/local/dev/iq-code/sexy-www/ -A user-map.txt git checkout HEAD…done
Clone all public user repositories with bashhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/clone-all-public-user-repositories-with-bash/Mon, 14 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/clone-all-public-user-repositories-with-bash/USER=YOURUSERNAME; PAGE=1 curl “https://api.github.com/users/$USER/repos?page=$PAGE&per_page=100" | grep -e ‘git_url*’ | cut -d \” -f 4 | xargs -L1 git clone From https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19576742/how-to-clone-all-repos-at-once-from-github

Configure i3 to navigate like vimhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/configure-i3-to-navigate-like-vim/Thu, 10 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/configure-i3-to-navigate-like-vim/Edit .config/i3/config and add: # change focus bindsym $mod+h focus left bindsym $mod+j focus down bindsym $mod+k focus up bindsym $mod+l focus right # split in horizontal orientation bindsym $mod+Shift+v split h # split in vertical orientation bindsym $mod+v split v From https://faq.i3wm.org/question/2294/vim-and-keybinds.1.html
Enable 3D acceleration in VMWare workstation on intel graphicshttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/enable-3d-acceleration-in-vmware-workstation-on-intel-graphics/Sat, 05 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/enable-3d-acceleration-in-vmware-workstation-on-intel-graphics/Enable blacklisted drivers in vmx file…. mks.gl.allowBlacklistedDrivers = "TRUE"

Generate cloudfront ssl certificateshttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/generate-cloudfront-ssl-certificates/Mon, 31 Jul 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/generate-cloudfront-ssl-certificates/Basically… Generate csr openssl req \ -sha256 \ -new -newkey \ rsa:2048 -nodes \ -keyout www.jeffsmithdev.net.key \ -out www.jeffsmithdev.net.csr Download certs & prepare cat COMODORSADomainValidationSecureServerCA.crt > chain.crt cat www_JeffSmithDev_net.crt > ServerCertificate.cer Upload aws iam upload-server-certificate --server-certificate-name JeffSmithDev-net --certificate-body file://ServerCertificate.cer --private-key file://www.jeffsmithdev.net.key --certificate-chain file://chain.crt --path /cloudfront/ssl/ List aws iam list-server-certificates Delete aws iam delete-server-certificate --server-certificate-name JeffSmithDev-net From https://bryce.fisher-fleig.org/blog/setting-up-ssl-on-aws-cloudfront-and-s3/

Setup bitbucket hg project with new keyhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/setup-bitbucket-project-hg-with-new-key/Mon, 03 Jul 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/setup-bitbucket-project-hg-with-new-key/Not exact steps but basically… CREATE AND USE NEW SSL KEY ssh-keygen -f ~/.ssh/tallymywork -C "tallymywork" Edit the ~/.ssh/config file. Host tallymywork HostName bitbucket.org User hg IdentityFile ~/.ssh/tallymywork pbcopy < ~/.ssh/tallymywork.pub ssh-add ~/.ssh/tallymywork ssh-add -l UPDATE .hgrc ssh://hg@tallymywork/tallymywork/tallymywork.bitbucket.org CLONE BLANK PROJECT hg clone ssh://hg@thoughtlogix/thoughtlogix/tallymywork
Resize gnome 3 titlebarshttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/resize-gnome-3-titlebars/Sun, 02 Jul 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/resize-gnome-3-titlebars/Edit ~/.config/gtk-3.0/gtk.css and log out / in. .header-bar { padding-top: 2.5px; padding-bottom: 2.5px; } .header-bar .button { padding-top: 4px; padding-bottom: 4px; } .header-bar.default-decoration { padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; } .header-bar.default-decoration .button.titlebutton { padding-top: 3px; padding-bottom: 3px; }

Import key: gpg --keyserver hkp://keys.gnupg.net --recv-keys 409B6B1796C275462A1703113804BB82D39DC0E3 7D2BAF1CF37B13E2069D6956105BD0E739499BDB Run script: \curl -sSL https://get.rvm.io | bash Check available versions: rvm remote known Install ruby: rvm install 2.4.1 Use ruby version: rvm --default use 2.4.1 Install bundler: gem install bundler

Edit workspace.xml and change the gradle window visibility to “false”. <window_info id="Gradle" active="false" anchor="right" auto_hide="false" internal_type="DOCKED" type="DOCKED" visible="false" show_stripe_button="true" weight="0.1782284" sideWeight="0.4481203" order="16" side_tool="false" content_ui="tabs" />

Install PIA on Archhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/install-pia-on-arch/Wed, 22 Feb 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/install-pia-on-arch/Install private-internet-access-vpn Edit /etc/private-internet-access/login.conf and add username on one line and passwork on next chmod 0600 /etc/private-internet-access/login.conf chown root:root /etc/private-internet-access/login.conf sudo pia -a From https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Private_Internet_Access_VPN

Store dotfiles in git repositoryhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/store-dotfiles-in-git/Fri, 10 Feb 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/store-dotfiles-in-git/Content hacked with mods from Atlassian Setup: git init --bare $HOME/.dotfiles alias dotfiles='/usr/bin/git --git-dir=$HOME/.dotfiles/ --work-tree=$HOME' dotfiles config --local status.showUntrackedFiles no echo "alias dotfiles='/usr/bin/git --git-dir=$HOME/.dotfiles/ --work-tree=$HOME'" >> $HOME/.bashrc Add: config status config add .vimrc config commit -m "Add vimrc" config add .bashrc config commit -m "Add bashrc" Remote (change to actual ssh): git remote add origin https://someRandomFatGuy@bitbucket.org/someRandomFatGuy/dotfiles.git Push: git push Clone: git clone --bare https://someRandomFatGuy@bitbucket.org/someRandomFatGuy/dotfiles.git $HOME/.dotfiles function dotfiles { /usr/bin/git --git-dir=$HOME/.

Basic TCP/IP sysctl hardeninghttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/basic-tcpip-sysctl-hardening/Tue, 21 Jun 2016 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/basic-tcpip-sysctl-hardening/ipv4 networking and equivalent ipv6 parameters ## TCP SYN cookie protection (default) ## helps protect against SYN flood attacks ## only kicks in when net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog is reached net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies = 1 ## protect against tcp time-wait assassination hazards ## drop RST packets for sockets in the time-wait state ## (not widely supported outside of linux, but conforms to RFC) net.ipv4.tcp_rfc1337 = 1 ## sets the kernels reverse path filtering mechanism to value 1 (on) ## will do source validation of the packet's recieved from all the interfaces on the machine ## protects from attackers that are using ip spoofing methods to do harm net.
Basic iptables firewall on ubuntu serverhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/basic-iptables-firewall-on-ubuntu-server/Tue, 21 Jun 2016 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/basic-iptables-firewall-on-ubuntu-server/For Ubuntu… IPT="/sbin/iptables" # Flush old rules, old custom tables $IPT --flush $IPT --delete-chain # Set default policies for all three default chains $IPT -P INPUT ACCEPT $IPT -P FORWARD ACCEPT $IPT -P OUTPUT ACCEPT # Enable free use of loopback interfaces $IPT -A INPUT -i lo -j ACCEPT $IPT -A OUTPUT -o lo -j ACCEPT # All TCP sessions should begin with SYN $IPT -A INPUT -p tcp ! --syn -m state --state NEW -s 0.

My .conkyrchttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/my-conkyrc/Tue, 10 May 2016 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/my-conkyrc/My conky config hacked together over the years (using old format)… ############################################## # conky configuration ############################################## ############################################## # Settings ############################################## background no use_xft yes xftfont Liberation Sans:size=9 xftalpha 1 update_interval 1.0 total_run_times 0 own_window yes own_window_type normal own_window_transparent yes own_window_transparent yes own_window_hints undecorated,sticky,skip_taskbar,skip_pager,below own_window_argb_visual yes own_window_argb_value 100 double_buffer yes minimum_size 600 maximum_width 300 draw_shades no draw_outline no draw_borders no draw_graph_borders no default_color ffffff default_shade_color ffffff default_outline_color ffffff alignment top_left gap_x -350 gap_y 0 no_buffers yes uppercase no cpu_avg_samples 2 override_utf8_locale no ############################################## # Output ############################################## TEXT ${font roboto:bold:size=10} ${time %A}, ${time %B} ${time %e}, ${time %Y} $alignr ${time %I:%M %P} ${hr} ${font roboto:bold:size=8}INT IP: $alignr ${addr enp11s0} ${font roboto:bold:size=8}EXT IP:$alignr${execi 3600 dig +short myip.

Simple sql-server creation scripthttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/simple-sql-server-creation-script/Fri, 26 Feb 2016 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/simple-sql-server-creation-script/Create db, login and user…. --drop database mydb; --drop user myuser; --drop login myuser; CREATE DATABASE [mydb] GO ALTER DATABASE mydb MODIFY FILE ( NAME = N'mydb' , SIZE = 102400KB , MAXSIZE = UNLIMITED, FILEGROWTH = 102400KB ) GO ALTER DATABASE mydb MODIFY FILE ( NAME = N'mydb_log' , SIZE = 1024KB , MAXSIZE = UNLIMITED , FILEGROWTH = 10%) GO USE [mydb] CREATE LOGIN myuser WITH PASSWORD = N'xxxxxxxxx', CHECK_POLICY = OFF, CHECK_EXPIRATION = OFF; GO CREATE USER myuser FROM LOGIN [myuser]; exec sp_addrolemember 'db_owner', 'mydb'; GO

Unison sample confighttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/unison-sample-config/Thu, 19 Mar 2015 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/unison-sample-config/A sample for one of my sync’s: # Unison preferences servercmd=/usr/local/bin/unison # Used for OSX ignore = Path vms ignore = Path node_modules ignore = Path bin ignore = Name .FBCIndex ignore = Name .FBCLockFolder ignore = Name {Cache*,.Trash*,.VolumeIcon.icns,.HSicon,Temporary*,.Temporary*,TheFindByContentFolder} ignore = Name {TheVolumeSettingsFolder,.Metadata,.filler,.idsff,.Spotlight,.DS_Store,.CFUserTextEncoding} ignore = Name .localized ignore = Name .fseventsd root = /home/jeffsmithdev/data-local root = ssh://jeffsmithdev@192.168.101.35//Users/jeffsmithdev/data-local
Basic curl rest testinghttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/basic-curl-rest-testing/Wed, 19 Nov 2014 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/basic-curl-rest-testing/curl -X DELETE http://localhost:12000/samples/1 curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"name:"sample-name","notes:"sample-notes"}' http://localhost:12000/samples/ url -X PUT -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"id": "2","name":"sample-name33333333","notes":"sample-notes"}' http://localhost:12000/api/samples/
Pigs for parallel compressionhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/pigs-for-parallel-compression/Mon, 02 Jun 2014 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/pigs-for-parallel-compression/Compress tar -c --use-compress-program=pigz -f someDir.tar.gz someDir/ DeCompress pigz -dc someDir.tar.gz | tar xf -
